title: Maniple, 17th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Polychrome cut and uncut velvet on a white satin ground in a floral design. Ends trimmed with gold ribbon. Backed with linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Maniple, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, linen, metallic thread. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-87.
